param.name: registry_id
param.doc: the id of the registry credential to be updated.

method.name: PUT
method.id: Update the login information for a Container Registry.
method.doc: Update the username/secret used to authenticate to a Container Registry. This will override any existing login credentials.
Warning: This API does not function without installing the Verify Identity Access Container Extension from the IBM Security App Exchange.

param.name: Accept:application/json
param.doc: Required for requests to the service

param.name: registry
param.doc: The address or domain name of the registry to authenticate to.

param.name: proxy_host
param.doc: An optional proxy to set when pulling images from this container registry. Additional properties can be set for this proxy, if they are not provided and do not have a default value, then they are ignored.

param.name: proxy_port
param.doc: The port for the proxy. The default is 3128.

param.name: proxy_user
param.doc: The user to authenticate to the proxy with.

param.name: proxy_pass
param.doc: The password to authenticate to the proxy with. Must be provided if proxy_user is set.

param.name: proxy_schema
param.doc: The TCP schema to use. The default is "http".

param.name: ca
param.doc: An optional CA Certificat bundle (PEM encoded) to verify connections to the container registry. This may be required if your registry uses a self-signed certificate.

response.doc: There is a problem with the request. The JSON message describes the problem.
